channel.title: Surface Tension Helicopter Dam Battle Crash
channel.description:
NOTE: I know there's probably a dozen other threads about game crashes but whatever.
Hi everyone, Completed the game a while back in Early October. I must say: BEST MOD EVER. But there was several crashes that made my experience not so great. Most of them were caused by too much detail, I think, that my laptop couldn't cope with. But one that stood out was the Helicopter Battle on the Dam in Surface Tension. I collected my Tau ammo from inside the building, I go out to kick the helicopter's ass, I shoot a 5 second charged blast from the Tau at the helicopter then the screen and game freeze, my screen goes dark and it shuts down all by itself. My experienced ruined: " I :'( just a little". So I think of some other ways to avoid this crash: Use a different gun, avoid the helicopter and run for it into the water etc. So I have posted my thoughts here I will suggest 1 thing: Take a bit of detail out of the helicopter probably. It's a great design but my laptop can't cope with the large amount of detail. But still, great mod, hope changes like this can be made :slight_smile:
